sentences.english: Bailang Stayed at home after graduating from primary school because of drop-out.
sentences.chinese: 白浪年少時頑劣不堪，小學畢業後便輟學在家。

sentences.english: I just a naughty child, always longing, hope the wing.
sentences.chinese: 我只是頑劣的孩子，總在憧憬着，希翼着。

definition: full of youthful vigor (idiom)/in the prime of youth
to curry favor (idiom); playing up to those in power/social climbing
to invent crazy nonsense/to cook up (excuses)/to talk at random/wild babble
lit. to point at the mulberry tree and curse the locust tree/fig. to scold sb indirectly/to make oblique accusations (idiom)
lit. helping tyrant Zhou 商紂王|商纣王[Shang1 Zhou4 wang2] in his oppression (idiom)/fig. to take the side of the evildoer/giving succor to the enemy
full of political wisdom (idiom)/politically astute/with encyclopedic experience of state policy
to view death as a return home/to not be afraid of dying/to face death with equanimity (idiom)
lit. trifling destroys the will (idiom); infatuation with fine details prevents one making progress/excessive attention to trivia saps the will
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
